short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoodLead is a Chrome extension that allows you to add leads to your HubSpot CRM while prospecting with a quick click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GoodLead is a prospecting tool that allows you to add leads to your CRM straight from your browser with a quick click of a button.

The extension will alert you when browsing if a website is already associated with a lead in your CRM, and will also detect + grab any contact info, contact page links, or social media pages from a given web page.

With options for customizations, personalized API integrations, and the ability to change or enhance Google search results based on specific criteria, GoodLead's flexibility makes it an indispensable lead gen tool for any sales team.
